arabic_dua: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ؛ اللَّهُمَّ جَدِيدَةَ وُجُودٍ فِي هَذَا الْوَقْتِ وَفِي هَذِهِ السَّاعَةِ مِنْ صَلَوَاتِكَ الْقَامَاتِ وَتَحِيَّاتِكَ الزَّاكِيَاتِ وَرِضْوَانِكَ الْأَكْبَرِ الْآتِيَةِ الْأَدْوَمِ عَلَى أَكْمَلِ عَبْدٍ لَكَ فِي هَذَا الْعَالَمِ مِنْ بَيْنِ آدَمَ الَّذِي أَقَمْتَنَا لَكَ طُلَّاً وَجَعَلْتَنَا لِحَوَائِجِ خَلْفِكَ فَبَانَةٍ وَمُخْلًى وَاضْطَفَفْتَنَا لِنَفْسِكَ وَأَقَمْتَنَا بِخَيْئِكَ وَأَظْهَرْتَنَا بِضُرِّتِكَ وَاخْتَرْتَنَا؛ شَسْتَوَى لِتَحْلِيلِكَ وَمُتَذَرٍّ لَا لِتَنْفِيذِ أَوَامِرَةِ؛ وَتَوَاجُبَاتٍ فِي أَرْضِكَ وَسَمَوَاتِكَ وَوَاسِطَةٍ؛ بَيْنَكَ وَبَيْنَ مَكَوِّنَاتِكَ وَبَلِّغْ سَلَامَ عَدِيدَةٍ؛ هَذَا إِلَيْهِ فَعَلَيْهِ مِنْكَ الْآنَ عَنْ عَدِيدَةِ أَشْرَفِ؛ التَّحِيَّاتِ وَأَزْكَى التَّسْلِيمَاتِ هِيَ اللَّهُمَّ ذِكْرِيَّةٍ؛ بَيْنِ كَوْنِي عِنْدَكَ بِمَا أَنْتَ تَعْلَمُ أَنَّهُ تَافِعٌ لِي؛ عَاجِلًا وَآجِلًا عَلَى قَدْرِ مَعْرِفَتِهِ بِكَ وَمُتَذَرٍّ بِهِ؛ لِدِينِكَ لَا عَلَى قَدْرِ عِلْمِي وَمُنْتَجَنِي فَهِيَ؛ إِنَّكَ يَكُلُّ فَضْلُ جَدِيدٍ وَعَلَى مَا تَشَاءُ قَدْرَهُ؛ اللَّهُمَّ اجْتِمَاعِي فِي قَلْبِ الْإِنْسَانِ الْكَامِلِ؛ وَحَبِيبِي فِي وَضْغَطِ اللَّهِ عَلَى سَبَبَاتَا مُحْشَدٍ؛ وَعَلَى اللَّهِ وَضْعِيَّةِ عَدًّا ذَرَّاتِ الْأَجْوَدِ وَعَدًّا؛ مَعْلُومَاتِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى اللَّهُمَّ وَفِّقْنِي لِقِرْآنَتِهَا؛ عَلَى الدَّوَامِ مَا مُبِينٍ يَا رَبَّ الْعَالَمِينَ؛
transcript: Bismillahir-Rahmanir-Raheem; Allahumma jadeedata wujoodin fee hatha al-waqti wa fee hathihi as-sa'ati min salawatika al-qamati wa tahiyyatika az-zakiyati wa ridwanika al-akbari al-atiyati al-adwami 'ala akmal 'abdin laka fee hatha al-'alami min bayni Adama alladhi aqamtan laka tullan wa ja'altana li-hawa'iji khalfika fabanatin wa mukhlan wadtafaftana li-nafsika wa aqamtan bi-khay'ika wa azhartana bi-durratika wakhtartana; Shastawa li-tahleelika wa mutadharrin la li-tanfeezi awamirati; wa tawajubatin fee ardika wa samawatika wa wasitatin; baynaka wa bayna makawwinatika wa balligh salama 'adeedatin; hatha ilayhi fa'alayhi minka al-ana 'an 'adeedati ashrafi; at-tahiyyati wa azka at-tasleemati hiya Allahumma dhikriyyatin; bayni kawni 'indaka bima anta ta'lamu annahu tafi'un li; 'ajilan wa ajilan 'ala qadri ma'rifatihi bika wa mutadharrin bihi; li-deenika la 'ala qadri 'ilmi wa muntajani fahiya; innaka yakullu fadlu jadeedin wa 'ala ma tasha'u qadrahu; Allahumma ijtimai'i fee qalbi al-insani al-kamili; wa habeebi fee wadghati Allahi 'ala sababata muhshadin; wa 'ala Allahi wad'iyyati 'addan dhararati al-ajwadi wa 'addan; ma'lumati Allahi ta'ala Allahumma waffiqni li-qira'atiha; 'ala ad-dawami ma mubeenin ya Rabba al-'alameen;
translate: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful; O Allah, renew my existence at this time and in this hour with Your elevated prayers, Your pure greetings, and Your greatest everlasting pleasure upon Your most perfect servant in this world from among the descendants of Adam whom You established for Yourself as pure and made us for the needs behind You, manifest and exclusive, and You gathered us to Yourself and established us with Your goodness and manifested us through Your affliction and chose us; I stand for Your analysis and submit, not to carry out commands; and obligations in Your earth and heavens and as an intermediary; between You and Your creations and convey abundant peace; this is to Him so upon Him from You now from the most noble abundance; the greetings and purest salutations are O Allah, my remembrance; while I am with You with what You know benefits me; immediately and ultimately according to his knowledge of You and submission; for Your religion, not according to my knowledge and production, so it is; indeed You encompass all new favor and according to what You will is its measure; O Allah, gather me in the heart of the perfect human; and my beloved in the pressure of Allah upon gathered causes; and upon Allah is the position of counting the particles of the most generous and counting; the knowledge of Allah the Exalted O Allah grant me success in reciting it; perpetually what is clear, O Lord of the worlds;
